Class Ray2

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.d.Ray2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRay2
public class Ray2
extends Object
implements IRay2

A ray consisting of an origin point and a unit direction vector.

Field Summary

          The ray's unit direction vector.
 Vector origin

          Creates an empty (invalid) ray.
